casebody.data:
Lewis Seasongood, et al., Respondents v. The New York Elevated Railroad Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 14, 1892. Appeal by defendants from judgment in favor of plaintiffs entered upon the report of a referee. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Sackett & Bennett, for respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Dugro and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Opinion by Gildersleeve, J.; Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Dugro, J., concurred.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
